com.robotgame.gameengine.Robot.Nodes

Class Node

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.robotgame.gameengine.Robot.Nodes.Node
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    And3Node, AndNode, BoostNode, ClockNode, DebugNode, DefaultNode, DelayNode, DistanceSensor, FalseNode, MajorityNode, MoveBackwardsNode, MoveForwardNode, NotNode, Or3Node, OrNode, TicTacNode, TrueNode, TurnLeftNode, TurnRightNode

    public abstract class Node
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract base class for all nodes.
    See Also:
    Robot, NodeSystem

    • Method Detail

      • Reset

        public void Reset()
        This has to be called for every node in the beginning of every update cycle to reset the nodes before updating them.

      • IsUpdated

        public boolean IsUpdated()
        Check if the node has been updated yet. Used in NodeSystem.Update() and NodeSystem.GetOutputOfNode().
        Returns:
        true if node has been updated this cycle.
        See Also:
        NodeSystem

      • GetNumInput

        public int GetNumInput()
        Gets the number of inputs of the node. Used by NodeSystem.GetOutputOfNode().
        Returns:
        Number of connections connected to the node.

            int connection)

      • AddInput

        public void AddInput(int connection)
        Adds an input to the node. Used by RobotFactory.CreateRobot().
        Parameters:
        connection - The index of the input connection.
        See Also:
        RobotFactory

      • GetInputConnection

        public int GetInputConnection(int channel)
        Gets the index of the connection to a specific channel
        Parameters:
        channel - the channel number
        Returns:
        the index of the input connection

      • GetOutput

        public boolean GetOutput()
        Gets the output value of the node.
        Returns:
        output value

      • Update

        public abstract void Update(MatchContext context,
          java.util.LinkedList<NodeAction> actions,
          boolean[] input)
        Must be implemented by all node sub classes! Part of the implementation must be to set _isUpdated = true. Updates the output of the node using the relevant input (for logic and action nodes) and a MatchContext object (for sensor nodes). If the node triggers any action (action nodes) a NodeAction object is added to actions. Used in NodeSystem.Update() and NodeSystem.GetOutputOfNode().
        Parameters:
        context - contains the position of all robots and various other info of possible use to sensor nodes.
        actions - a list of NodeAction objects ready to receive any actions triggered by action nodes.
        input - an array containing all input values to the node.
        See Also:
        NodeSystem, NodeAction
